2022-04-23.name: Free Entrance Day at Minnesota state parks
2022-04-23.summary: Entrance to all 75 Minnesota state parks and recreation areas is free today.

2022-04-23.name: Milwaukee Film Festival
2022-04-23.summary: Watch more than 200 films from around the globe, based at the 1927 Oriental Theatre on the East Side. Virtual passes also are available for home screening.

2022-04-23.name: Julien Dubuque Film Festival
2022-04-23.summary: See 70 films and a silent-film showcase. There's a red-carpet awards show Saturday.

2022-04-23.name: Spring Outdoor Adventure Expo
2022-04-23.summary: A spring kickoff for outdoor enthusiasts, with presentations on outdoor adventures and destinations and a gear sale and auction of used canoes and kayaks.

2022-04-23.name: Bluegrass, Bourbon & Brews Festival
2022-04-23.summary: Hear music at half a dozen venues in the downtown of this western Wisconsin college town.

2022-04-23.name: Grant's Home Front Reenactment
2022-04-23.summary: In Ulysses S. Grant's hometown, living-history reenacters hold an encampment along the river and stage Civil War battle reenactments at 11:30 a.m. Saturday and 1:30 p.m. Sunday.

2022-04-23.name: Eau Claire Jazz Festival
2022-04-23.summary: Headliners play the State Theatre, and on Friday, more than 50 bands play acoustic jazz, ragtime, big-band and blues along Barstow Street downtown, recreating New York's 52nd Street.

2022-04-23.name: Between the Bluffs Beer, Wine and Cheese Festival
2022-04-23.summary: Sample cheese and more than 200 beers and 45 wines at the Oktoberfest grounds.

2022-04-01.name: Restaurant Week
2022-04-01.summary: Time to pack on the calories: More than 370 restaurants offer three-course prix-fixe menus for $25 at brunch or lunch and $39 or $55 at dinner.

2022-04-01.name: Minneapolis/St. Paul International Film Festival
2022-04-01.summary: More than 250 films from more than 70 countries will be shown, based at the five screens of St. Anthony Main, across the river from downtown.

2022-04-02.name: Maple Syrup Fest
2022-04-02.summary: In the northeast corner of Wisconsin, tour the sugarbush, tap trees,  make maple taffy in the snow and shop at an arts and crafts fair.

2022-04-07.name: Mission Creek Festival
2022-04-07.summary: Dozens of musicians, artists and writers perform and read at downtown venues. On Friday evening, there's a literature crawl.

2022-04-29.name: Art Attack
2022-04-29.summary: On the eastern shore of Lake Michigan, the eight towns between Michiana and Sawyer hold artist demonstrations, workshops and gallery receptions.

2022-04-29.name: Midwest Music Fest
2022-04-29.summary: Dozens of musical groups in all genres play in museums, galleries, cafes and arts centers across town. There are arts workshops for children, too. Headliners include Polica and Haley.

2022-04-29.name: U.S. Grant's Birthday
2022-04-29.summary: The former home of the Civil War general and president celebrates his 200th birthday with free admission to the Grant Museum, Main Street walking tours with Gen. Grant, a pie auction, a spy trial and cake.

2022-04-30.name: Milwaukee Film Festival
2022-04-30.summary: Watch more than 200 films from around the globe, based at the 1927 Oriental Theatre on the East Side. Virtual passes also are available for home screening.

2022-04-30.name: Art Attack
2022-04-30.summary: On the eastern shore of Lake Michigan, the eight towns between Michiana and Sawyer hold artist demonstrations, workshops and gallery receptions.

2022-04-30.name: International Festival of Owls
2022-04-30.summary: This southeast Minnesota town offers owl prowls, hooting contests, pellet dissection, live-owl programs and children's activities.

2022-04-30.name: Maifest
2022-04-30.summary: There's a lot going on in this former communal society in eastern Iowa — a 10 a.m. Saturday parade, polka music, keg-tapping, food-sampling, artisan demonstrations and pony rides.

2022-04-30.name: Midwest Music Fest
2022-04-30.summary: Dozens of musical groups in all genres play in museums, galleries, cafes and arts centers across town. There are arts workshops for children, too. Headliners include Polica and Haley.

2022-04-30.name: Dairy State Cheese & Beer Festival
2022-04-30.summary: There's cheese and beer from around the state plus live music at the Brat Stop.

2022-04-30.name: Taylor County Maple Fest
2022-04-30.summary: This festival at the fairgrounds features maple syrup in a breakfast, a baking contest, a cooking demonstration and crafts plus music,  children's activities and door prizes.

2022-04-30.name: U.S. Grant's Birthday
2022-04-30.summary: The former home of the Civil War general and president celebrates his 200th birthday with free admission to the Grant Museum, Main Street walking tours with Gen. Grant, a pie auction, a spy trial and cake.

2022-04-16.name: Eggstravaganza
2022-04-16.summary: At the Racine Zoo, the all-day Eggstravaganza includes a candy hunt, bounce houses, an egg dig, a dance party, egg- and cookie-decorating, crafts and games. Included with admission.
